item.description:
https://www.facebook.com/events/410641132289835/

Saturday, June 2, 2012.2:00pm.. 1230 Elm St Manchester, NH 03101

ATTENTION: Liberty-minded folks thinking about running for office this year

Please join us for a candidate/campaign workshop on Saturday, June 2nd, starting at 2:00 p.m.

Sponsored by the New Hampshire Liberty Alliance (www.nhliberty.org) and hosted by Muni Savyon and R...ep Mark Warden (R)

This class will include topics such as:
Evaluating your race
Campaign strategies
Building name recognition
Contacting voters
Election day tactics

The workshop is FREE, but a suggested donation to the NHLA PAC will help support liberty candidates, maybe even you.

LOCATION: Liberty Harbor Academy, 1230 Elm St Manchester, NH
R.S.V.P. political@nhliberty.org

This is a non-partisan event, appropriate for all those who want to see smaller government and greater personal liberty in New Hampshire.
item.name: NHLA Candidate's Workshop
